sections.heading: party aggrieved by a final order of the commission regarding an application or assessment under the Major Oil Pipeline Siting Act, including, but not limited to, a decision relating to the public interest, may appeal
sections.text: The appeal shall be in accordance with section 75-136.SourceLaws 2011, First Spec.

57-1409.Appeal.

Any party aggrieved by a final order of the commission regarding an application or assessment under the Major Oil Pipeline Siting Act, including, but not limited to, a decision relating to the public interest, may appeal. The appeal shall be in accordance with section 75-136.

SourceLaws 2011, First Spec. Sess., LB1, ยง 10;Laws 2013, LB545, ยง 1.
